org.linter
Class ServiceParserChainManager

java.lang.Object
  org.linter.ServiceParserChainManager

public class ServiceParserChainManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manage ServiceParser Chains of Responsibility Linter and consumers register ServiceParsers capable of parsing all or specific URLs LintedPages requires ServiceParsers appropriate for their URL
